Description:
GitHub has introduced new features targeted at pull requests. These repo-level controls prevent your code repository from becoming a magnet for AI generated noise and drive-by contributions. Learn how these new toggles offer simple solutions to unwanted pull requests.

#GitHub #SoftwareDevelopment #Coding

About GitHub It’s where over 180 million developers create, share, and ship the best code possible. It’s a place for anyone, from anywhere, to build anything—it’s where the world builds software. https://github.com
Title: New GitHub features to prevent unwanted pull requests
Author: GitHub
